        public TextSegmenterResult(java.lang.String text,
                   java.lang.String corpusConfig,
                   java.lang.String segmenterName,
                   int c99MaskSize,
                   int c99SegmentsWanted,

                   int tilerStepSize,
                   java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.String>> sentences,
                   java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> segments)
        Create populated text segment results.
        Parameters:
        text - Text to segment.
        corpusConfig - Corpus configuration.
        segmenterName - Segmenter name.
        c99MaskSize - C99 mask size.
        c99SegmentsWanted - C99 number of segments wanted.
        tilerSlidingWindowSize - Text tiling sliding window size.
        tilerStepSize - Text tiling step size.
        sentences - Word and sentences.
        segments - Segment positions.

    • Method Detail

      • makeSegmentTexts

        protected void makeSegmentTexts()
        Make segment texts from sentences and segment offsets.

        On output, the segmentTexts field is set to the melded sentence text for each segment, in order.
